thread.title: Boulder Organic soups now available in Target stores
thread.title_full: Boulder Organic soups now available in Target stores - The Denver Post

author: Shay Castle
title: Boulder Organic soups now available in Target stores
text:
Fans of Boulder Organic's line of fresh, ready-to-eat soups have one more store at which to snag some stew.
Six flavors of the organic soups now are on shelves at 850 Target stores nationwide, a roll-out that helps and highlights the soup company's continued growth.
"Target is going to be a great customer for us," said Greg Powers, CEO of Boulder Organic. "They have an ongoing and growing focus on natural and organic products, and we're happy to be a company they identified as central to that goal."
Powers said the deal cements Target as one of Boulder Organic's biggest customers.
Read more of the article Boulder Organic soups now available in Target stores at DailyCamera.com . Advertisement
